gwendolyncrclclient

Class KittingDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwendolyncrclclient.KittingDemo

  • public class KittingDemo
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to perform or fake performing the kitting demonstration for the fanuc robot. If live crcl model status, then the robot will use the model inferences to determine the free gear and matching kit open slot.

    • Method Detail

      • issueRobotCommands

        public int issueRobotCommands(int state)
        use a state table to issue robot command. KittingDemo class will do the following: 1) find an available gear (in supply tray) and kit open slot to place the 2-5) approach, move to gear, grasp gear, and retract 5-8) approach kit open slot move to near open slot, release gear, and then retract
        Parameters:
        state - current state to execute.
        Returns:
        updated state number.
